definition: to admire talented people/to value talent
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only

sentences.english: Only an act of true love can thaw a frozen heart.
sentences.chinese: 唯有真爱才能够融化冰冻的心。

sentences.english: Why am I loved only when I'm gone?
sentences.chinese: 为什么只有死去，爱才将降临于我身？

sentences.english: You as a person must be willing to fall, only then it can happen.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个人你必须愿意掉进去，然后爱才会发生。

sentences.english: Were acceptance is love can happens.
sentences.chinese: 当接受发生，爱才会发生。

sentences.english: It is love that proves to be the ultimate healing grace.
sentences.chinese: 只有爱才是具有最终治救力量的恩泽。

sentences.english: Life is a journey and it is love that makes that journey worthwhile .
sentences.chinese: 生活是人生的一次旅程，只有爱才会让它有意义。
